price: 2. Dan jika mereka (orang-orang musyrikin) melihat sesuatu tanda (mukjizat), mereka berpaling dan berkata, "(Ini adalah) sihir yang terus menerus."
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
